results.name: Jewel Match Origins 2 - Bavarian Palace Collector's Edition

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 491 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

Minimum:
  • OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo ou superior
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card, AMD Radeon HD 6250 or NVIDIA GeForce 8400M GT, NVIDIA GeForce 6100
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 612 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game-breaking graphics glitch has not happened on Mac to our knowledge. Reach out to us on Discord if you have any issues.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 / AMD Radeon R7 265
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 612 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: We're not entirely sure of the exact minimum specs you need to run the game. Players with significantly worse graphics cards (Nvidia GeForce 210) have experienced a game-breaking graphics glitch which turns the screen black except for the cursor, which duplicates itself. Please reach out to us on Discord if the issue occurs.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 600Mhz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.2GHz or equivalent processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: 2GHz or Higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS or similar
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz dual-core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS or similar
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz quad-core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz dual-core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz quad-core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

requirements_en.minimum:

  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1.2GHz processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1.4GHz processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X El Capitan (10.11) or later
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX-compatible card
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i2 1.2 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics series or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.3 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics series or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Yes
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Yes

  • Sound Card: No

  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
